name: Videopopup
tagline: Show a video in a popup. Simple.
body: # Video Popup # A jQuery plugin for opening Vimeo and Youtube videos in a modal window. * Configurable embed settings. * Stylable with LESS (or CSS, whatever). ## Setup ## Include jQuery and the videopopup js and css files in your HTML. Make some links and add some video codes. Vimeo Youtube Do something like the following to make your links work: $('.my-video-links').videopopup({ autoplay: true, color: '#f00' }); ## Options ## All options are optional. Defaults are shown below. Most options affect either Vimeo or Youtube links but you can specify them all together - it won't cause problems. ### Options for both ### * autoplay (true) ### Options for Vimeo Links ### * title (false) * byline (false) * portrait (false) * color (#00adef) ### Options for Youtube links ### * controls (true) * showinfo (false)
